verbose_text: At a concentration of 33 mM, HG decreased ERK phosphorylation and FOXM1 expression by 53.8 and 43.9%, respectively, compared with the control (untreated) group (both P < 0.05); however, the suppressive effects on the ERK / FOXM1 pathway were markedly reversed by pre-incubation with ISDN (ERK phosphorylation : ISDN + HG group vs. HG group, 0.85 +/-0.16 vs. 0.46 +/-0.12, P < 0.05; FOXM1 expression : ISDN + HG group vs. HG group, 0.79 +/-0.14 vs. 0.56 +/-0.15, P < 0.05) (XREF_FIG).
